channel.title: INfinance

item.title: Childfree people get the wrong financial advice — and they’ll be paying for it in their old age
item.description: The author of “The Childfree Guide to Life and Money” discusses why estate planning is different for people with and without children.

item.title: Is GoFundMe the Best Way to Donate to L.A. Fire Victims?
item.description: Crowdfunding money doesn’t always go where it is needed most.

item.title: The bull market faces a Trump ‘reality check’ next week, says this strategist. Here’s the trade to make.
item.description: Stocks are very vulnerable to news of harsher-than-hoped-for tariffs

item.title: Trump's Own Plans Stand in the Way of Repeating His Economic Success
item.description: Last time, tariffs came only after huge tax cuts. Reversing that order is dangerous.

item.title: German stocks are quietly rallying. An election’s coming up.
item.description: German stocks have been the stars of the young new year, ripping higher on Friday to a fresh record high.
